## 🎓 🧮 Available Courses

### [🎓 🧮 Differential and Integral Calculus Course](calculus/index.qmd)

This course has been carefully developed for students who want to master **Differential and Integral Calculus** in a clear, visual, and applied way. Here you will find a solid introduction to the theory, accompanied by practical examples and several real-world applications that facilitate understanding — supported by modern computational tools for visualizations, simulations, and problem solving.

::: {.callout-tip}
In addition, all modules include an **extra advanced module (AP)**, with more advanced topics and additional theoretical discussions, which may be skipped on a first reading, depending on the student’s pace and interest.
:::
